items.name: AddStyle
items.description: Add a CSS class to a panel.

items.name: AddStyleAfterDelay
items.description: Add a CSS class to a panel after a specified delay.

items.name: AddStyleToEachChild
items.description: Add a CSS class to all children of this panel.

items.name: AddTimedStyle
items.signature: AddTimedStyle(class: panoramasymbol, duration: float, preDelay: float): void
items.description: Add a class for a specified duration, with optional pre-delay; clears existing timers when called with same class.

items.name: AsyncEvent
items.description: Fire another event after a delay (in seconds).

items.name: DOTADisplayDashboardTip
items.description: Tip to display, panel to attach to (default 'DefaultTipAttachment')

items.name: DOTAHideAbilityTooltip
items.description: Hide the ability tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideBuffTooltip
items.description: Hide the buff tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideDroppedItemTooltip
items.description: Hide the dropped item tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideEconItemTooltip
items.description: Hide the econ item tooltip.

items.name: DOTAHideFacetTooltip
items.description: Hides the variant tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideProfileCardTooltip
items.description: Hide the profile card tooltip.

items.name: DOTAHideRankTierTooltip
items.description: Hide the rank tier tooltip.

items.name: DOTAHideRuneTooltip
items.description: Hide the rune tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideTI10EventGameTooltip
items.description: Hide the ti10 event game tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideTextTooltip
items.description: Hide the text tooltip

items.name: DOTAHideTitleImageTextTooltip
items.description: Hide the title image text tooltip.

items.name: DOTAHideTitleTextTooltip
items.description: Hide the title text tooltip.

items.name: DOTALiveStreamUpcoming
items.description: Notify change in RTime32 we expect the stream to start

items.name: DOTALiveStreamVideoLive
items.description: Notify change in stream state (we detected the stream going live)

items.name: DOTALiveStreamVideoPlaying
items.description: Notify change in video state (is it pointing at a live stream page or not)

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityInventoryItemTooltip
items.description: Show tooltip for an item in the entityIndex NPC's inventory.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityShopItemTooltip
items.signature: DOTAShowAbilityShopItemTooltip(abilityName: string, guideName: string, entityIndex: int32): void
items.description: Show tooltip for an item in the entityIndex NPC's shop.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityTooltip
items.description: Show an ability tooltip.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForEntityIndex
items.description: Show an ability tooltip. Level information comes from the entity specified by the entityIndex.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForFacet
items.signature: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForFacet(abilityName: string, facetName: CUtlStringToken, showVideo: bool): void
items.description: Show an ability tooltip for a specific facet.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForGuide
items.signature: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForGuide(abilityName: string, guideName: string, arg3: HeroID_t, arg4: bool): void
items.description: Show an ability tooltip annotated with a particular guide's info.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForHero
items.signature: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForHero(abilityName: string, heroid: HeroID_t, heroVariant: HeroFacetID_t, arg4: bool, arg5: bool): void
items.description: Show an ability tooltip for the specified hero.

items.name: DOTAShowAbilityTooltipForLevel
items.description: Show an ability tooltip for a specific level.

items.name: DOTAShowBuffTooltip
items.signature: DOTAShowBuffTooltip(entityIndex: int32, buffSerial: int32, onEnemy: bool): void
items.description: Show a buff tooltip for the specified entityIndex + buff serial.

items.name: DOTAShowEconItemTooltip
items.signature: DOTAShowEconItemTooltip(itemDef: item_definition_index_t, styleIndex: style_index_t, heroId: HeroID_t): void
items.description: Show the econ item tooltip for a given item, style, and hero. Use 0 for the default style, and 0 for the default hero.

items.name: DOTAShowFacetTooltip
items.description: Shows a variant tooltip for the given hero facet key

items.name: DOTAShowProfileCardTooltip
items.description: Show a user's profile card. Use pro name determines whether to use their professional team name if applicable.

items.name: DOTAShowProfileCardTooltipForPartyMember
items.description: Show a user's profile card including their hero ban choices. Use pro name determines whether to use their professional team name if applicable.

items.name: DOTAShowRankTierTooltip
items.description: Show the rank tier tooltip for a user

items.name: DOTAShowRuneTooltip
items.signature: DOTAShowRuneTooltip(x: int32, y: int32, runeType: int32): void
items.description: Show a rune tooltip in the X Y location for the rune type

items.name: DOTAShowTI10EventGameTooltip
items.description: Show a ti10 event game tooltip

items.name: DOTAShowTextTooltip
items.description: Show a tooltip with the given text.

items.name: DOTAShowTextTooltipStyled
items.description: Show a tooltip with the given text. Also apply a CSS class named "style" to allow custom styling.

items.name: DOTAShowTitleImageTextTooltip
items.signature: DOTAShowTitleImageTextTooltip(title: string, imagePath: string, text: string): void
items.description: Show a tooltip with the given title, image, and text.

items.name: DOTAShowTitleImageTextTooltipStyled
items.signature: DOTAShowTitleImageTextTooltipStyled(title: string, imagePath: string, text: string, style: panoramasymbol): void
items.description: Show a tooltip with the given title, image, and text. Also apply a CSS class named "style" to allow custom styling.

items.name: DOTAShowTitleTextTooltip
items.description: Show a tooltip with the given title and text.

items.name: DOTAShowTitleTextTooltipStyled
items.signature: DOTAShowTitleTextTooltipStyled(title: string, text: string, style: panoramasymbol): void
items.description: Show a tooltip with the given title and text. Also apply a CSS class named "style" to allow custom styling.

items.name: DropInputFocus
items.description: Drop focus entirely from the window containing this panel.

items.name: IfHasClassEvent
items.description: Fire another event if this panel has a given class.

items.name: IfHoverOtherEvent
items.description: Fire another event if currently hovering over a panel with the given ID.

items.name: IfNotHasClassEvent
items.description: Fire another event if this panel does not have a given class.

items.name: IfNotHoverOtherEvent
items.description: Fire another event if not currently hovering over a panel with the given ID.

items.name: MovePanelDown
items.description: Move down from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.

items.name: MovePanelLeft
items.description: Move left from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.

items.name: MovePanelRight
items.description: Move right from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.

items.name: MovePanelUp
items.description: Move up from the panel. By default, this will change the focus position, but other panel types may implement this differently.

items.name: PageDown
items.description: Scroll the panel down by one page.

items.name: PageLeft
items.description: Scroll the panel left by one page.

items.name: PagePanelDown
items.description: Scroll the panel down by one page.

items.name: PagePanelLeft
items.description: Scroll the panel left by one page.

items.name: PagePanelRight
items.description: Scroll the panel left by one page.

items.name: PagePanelUp
items.description: Scroll the panel up by one page.

items.name: PageRight
items.description: Scroll the panel right by one page.

items.name: PageUp
items.description: Scroll the panel up by one page.

items.name: RemoveStyle
items.description: Remove a CSS class from a panel.

items.name: RemoveStyleAfterDelay
items.description: Remove a CSS class from a panel after a specified delay.

items.name: RemoveStyleFromEachChild
items.description: Remove a CSS class from all children of this panel.

items.name: ScrollDown
items.description: Scroll the panel down by one line.

items.name: ScrollLeft
items.description: Scroll the panel left by one line.

items.name: ScrollPanelDown
items.description: Scroll the panel down by one line.

items.name: ScrollPanelLeft
items.description: Scroll the panel left by one line.

items.name: ScrollPanelRight
items.description: Scroll the panel right by one line.

items.name: ScrollPanelUp
items.description: Scroll the panel up by one line.

items.name: ScrollRight
items.description: Scroll the panel right by one line.

items.name: ScrollToBottom
items.description: Scroll this panel to the bottom.

items.name: ScrollToTop
items.description: Scroll this panel to the top.

items.name: ScrollUp
items.description: Scroll the panel up by one line.

items.name: SetChildPanelsSelected
items.description: Set whether any child panels are :selected.

items.name: SetInputFocus
items.description: Set focus to this panel.

items.name: SetPanelEnabled
items.description: Sets whether the given panel is enabled

items.name: SetPanelSelected
items.description: Set whether this panel is :selected.

items.name: SwitchStyle
items.description: Switch which class the panel has for a given attribute slot. Allows easily changing between multiple states.

items.name: TogglePanelSelected
items.description: Toggle whether this panel is :selected.

items.name: ToggleStyle
items.description: Toggle whether a panel has the given CSS class.

items.name: TriggerStyle
items.description: Remove then immediately add back a CSS class from a panel. Useful to re-trigger events like animations or sound effects.

items.name: UIShowCustomLayoutParametersTooltip
items.signature: UIShowCustomLayoutParametersTooltip(name: string, layoutPath: string, parameters: string): void
